transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha ji sir actually sir thodi si aawaz na mujhe aapki clear nahi aa rahi thi abhi aapko meri aawaz clear aa rahi hai isme?
Customer: Ekdam ekdam ekdam aawaz clear hai bilkul aawaz theek hai theek hai
Executive: To actual ho gaya actual ho gaya wo koi baat nahi aapko maine aapko de diya aapko de diya
Customer: Ji ji ji ji actually sir meeting karne se thoda sa ye rehta hai na sir ki aamne samne agar jo banda aapko cheeze bata raha hai samjha pa raha hai aap bhi easily cheezo ko samajh pae to mujhe sir ye cheeze confirm karani thi ki aapka uska jo business hai wo pan India aap karte hai ya koi specific location hai waha pe karte hai sir aapka?
Customer: Hamara hamara pan India me hai pan India pan India
Executive: Pan India pe hai okay isse pehle sir aapka aapka jo production aapka jo product hai wo pan India jata hai sir matlab aap bechte hai abhi tak abhi jo kaam kar rahe hai wo pan India me kar rahe hai matlab kai states ko bechte hai aap apna product?
Customer: Kaha pe sir foreign foreign country me?
Executive: Nahi mera bas ye kehne ka matlab hai sir aap apna jo kaam karte hai wo pan India sir aap pehle se karte aa rahe hai abhi aap IndiaMART ke through pan India karke kaam karna chahte hai?
Customer: Nahi wo to hum jo wo aapko maine to bola wo jo 2012 13 saal me na
Executive: Ji ji ji ji
Customer: IndiaMART ka IndiaMART ka sath chhoda lekin usse pehle hum baat kiya tha fir fir aap IndiaMART ka log phone karta hai idhar jo Kolkata wale hai bahut sare aapka purana log tha shayad wo kaam chhod ke chala gaya wo log wo log ke sath hamara dost ban gaya aisa hi ho gaya wo hamara jo office hai na wo aapke jo office hai wo kabhi jab fursat milta hai IndiaMART ka wo kabhi worker hai jab fursat milta hai aise aise aisa hi dost ban gaya jab samay milta tha hamara ye
Executive: Ha ji ha ji
Customer: Idhar office me aa jata hai hamare sath matlab jo kya bole golpo karta hai ji ji to aisa hi IndiaMART ka bahut log hamara phone me hai wo abhi shayad kaam chhod ke chala gaya lekin dost ban gaya hai dost reh gaya wo koi baat nahi IndiaMART acha hai acha hai isme business aa raha hai lekin suniye na suniye na sir hum jo bol rahe hai actual hum yaha pe na kaam karke mera mera jo Durga wala jo factory hai wo hum kaam chhod ke dhai baje tak hai naye baje theek hai sir naye baje raat 9 baje to subha mam se baat yahi hua tha 9 baje ke baad hum free ho jate hai wo subha mam ne bola subha mam ne bola mera to office hai wo to chutti ho jata hai uske baad to customer koi reply nahi 9 baje ke kaise hoga to theek hai koi baat nahi to aapka jo phone mil gaya na sir ek bar ek bar ek bar jab hum 9 baje ke baad matlab bhai bhai hamara yaha se 5 minute dur hai to koi baat nahi to hum free ho jate hai lekin hum raat me kya phone kar sakte hai isliye
Executive: Ji ji
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir aapka dekhiye agar aapka aisa hi hai ki sir aap 9 baje ke baad ek bar aap bhi free ho payenge to ek bar aap bhai ke sath mujhe baat kara dijiyega sir koi dikkat nahi hai hum aur aap ek bar discuss kar lenge koi aisi dikkat nahi hai to mai ek kaam kar raha hu sir mai aapko abhi apna personal number bhi share kar de raha hu aap ek bar kar dijiye na to aapke sath hi baat hoga 9 baje ke baad kyuki us time me hum free ho jate hai to actual kya hai actual ye naya wala business hai na hamara jo naya factory lagaya usme labour log jyada kam hai isliye waha pe hum uske sath hum rehte hai to kaam karte hai to isliye jab phone hota hai aata hai kabhi utha nahi sakta to isliye hum yahi bol rahe hai 9 baje ke baad ekdam free ho jate hai to mere ko lagta hai wahi time me aapka aapka jo mera jo inquiry hai aap jo bolna chahte hai wo baat ekdam ho jata hai
Customer: Bilkul sir
Executive: Bilkul bilkul bilkul bilkul sahi keh rahe hai sir aap bilkul sahi hai aur mera sir office to waise end ho jata hai but koi dikkat nahi hai mai aap agar 9 baje ke baad mujhe connect karenge sir mai aapke liye available hu mai aapse baat kar lunga koi dikkat nahi hai
Customer: Aur aur suniye na uddhav mam to raat hone ke baad wo to duty chhod deta hai lekin phone karne se nahi acha hoga aap aap aapka hi number aapko jo personal number hai wo ek bar mera is number me whatsapp kar dijiye aap aapke sath hi mai baat karunga wahi acha hoga theek hai
Executive: Ji ji
Executive: Okay sir
Executive: Okay okay mai mai samajh gaya sir mai ek kaam karta hu mai na aapko apna personal number share kar de raha hu abhi whatsapp me ek bar aap jab bhi free hoiyega aap mujhe call kar lijiyega 9 baje ke baad kar lijiyega aap kar denge mai ek bar hum aapke brother bhi rahenge na sir to hum log ab jo services hai uske bare me acche se samjha payenge sir aapko bhi
Customer: Ha ha suniye na 9 baje ke baad nahi aur phone karunga aap mujhe personal number de dijiye baat hoga aaj hi hum karenge theek hai
Executive: Ji ji
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai sir mai aapko na ek kaam kar raha hu mai number share kar deta hu okay sir
Customer: Ji sir ji sir okay okay sir okay thank you thank you thank you thank you
Executive: Thank you sir thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discuss business details after 9 PM.

- Wants executive's personal WhatsApp number.



Resolution:

- Executive shared personal number for later discussion.

- Agreed to discuss business after 9 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- pan india, business, personal number, timing
